item.description:
Wednesday Jan 11th UPDATE:

 

EVENT DATE IS CANCELED

From Zoom Info

"So sorry to say that we have to cancel this event because our CEO’s schedule has changed and he won’t be in town.  We plan to hold on the event until he is back in town and has the proper time to review the resumes and meet with individuals.  I will be back in touch with details regarding possibly rescheduling.  I apologize and hope this doesn’t cause any scheduling conflicts for you."

 

BostonSEO.org SPONSORED EVENT:

ZoomInfo Invites You to a Marketing Open House & Contest!

Would you like the opportunity to showcase your work to a great group of people, try to win a MacBook Air, an iPad 2 or a Kindle Fire? Maybe even find your next dream marketing job?

ZoomInfo is searching for a few A players to join it's marketing team. If you have at least five years of marketing experience, are very tech savvy, possess an entrepreneurial spirit, are extremely focused on results.

ZoomInfo IS HIRING!

Director of Marketing

Marketing Manager

About ZoomInfo

A leading B2B directory and business information provider that offers real-time, in-depth profiles of millions of businesses and employees and the market’s most powerful tools for searching and targeting.

Blog: http://www.zoominfo.com/business/blog/

www.Facebook.com/ZoomInformation

www.Twitter.com/ZoomInfo

More Details & RSVP at http://go.zoominfo.com/marketing-open-house

Please support are sponsors

Because they help us cover expenses to bring in some amazing speakers for 2012.

1. Share the event link

To all your Boston marketing peeps http://go.zoominfo.com/marketing-open-house

2. Tweet it

@ZoomInfo is hosting a Marketing Open House & Contest on 1/17! Join Us and possibly find your next dream marketing lnkd.in/FSxK9b
item.how_to_find_us: ZoomInfo.com corporate office in Waltham, MA

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Marketing Open House : UPDATE CANCELLED!
